Hero.h2: This is a free and powerful Odoo Android client that supports community and enterprise editions from version 16+ and above, and also specially supports version 14 enterprise edition.

Feature.h3: Features of MetaERP Odoo Android Client
Feature.description1: Supports community and enterprise editions from version 16+ and above
Feature.description2: Integrates GMS/HMS, supports native Android message notifications

Pricing.description: Choose the plan that best suits your needs.

CTA.h3: View your business on Odoo anytime, anywhere!
